title: Sequence Memory
description: Remember and increasingly long pattern of button presses.

title: Aim Trainer
description: How quickly can you hit all targets?

title: Number Memory
description: Remember the longest number you can.

title: Verbal Memory
description: Keep as many words in short term memory as possible.

title: Chimp Test
description: Are you smarter than a chimpanzee?

title: Visual Memory
description: Remember an increasingly large broad of squares.

title: Typing
description: How many words per minute can you write?
